member.name: T:BlueOcean.Framework.Runtime.Container.Forms.WinScheduleDatabaseSupportBase
member.summary: Base class for the WinSchedule database access classes.
member.remarks: The WinScheduleDatabaseSupportBase class is an abstract class which defines properties that return instances of the OleDB-related classes that are necessary to connect to a database. The 'ConnectionString' property, which must be overridden in a derived class, defines the connection string specific to that type of database. The DataAdapterForOwners and DataAdapterForAppointments properties, which also must be overridden in a derived class, define the OleDbCommand instances which control the selection, updating, and deletion of records in their respective tables.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Runtime.Container.Forms.WinScheduleDatabaseSupportBase.SELECT_OWNERS_TEMPLATE
member.summary: Template for the SQL SELECT statement for Owners.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Runtime.Container.Forms.WinScheduleDatabaseSupportBase.SELECT_APPOINTMENTS_TEMPLATE
member.summary: Template for the SQL SELECT statement for Appointments.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Runtime.Container.Forms.WinScheduleDatabaseSupportBase.OWNERS_TABLE_NAME
member.summary: Defines the name of the table that contains the Owner data.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Runtime.Container.Forms.WinScheduleDatabaseSupportBase.APPOINTMENTS_TABLE_NAME
member.summary: Defines the name of the table that contains the Appointment data.

member.name: F:BlueOcean.Framework.Runtime.Container.Forms.WinScheduleDatabaseSupportBase.MAX_APPOINTMENT_BYTES
member.summary: The maximum number of bytes allowed for an appointment. Note that this is a function of the database table, and should not be changed here.

member.name: M:BlueOcean.Framework.Runtime.Container.Forms.WinScheduleDatabaseSupportBase.UpdateOwnersTable
member.summary: Commits any outstanding changes to owner data to the DataTable.

member.name: M:BlueOcean.Framework.Runtime.Container.Forms.WinScheduleDatabaseSupportBase.UpdateAppointmentsTable
member.summary: Commits any outstanding changes to appointment data to the DataTable.

member.name: M:BlueOcean.Framework.Runtime.Container.Forms.WinScheduleDatabaseSupportBase.OnRowChanged(System.Object,System.Data.DataRowChangeEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the RowUpdated event for the data tables. We use this to receive a notification when a row has been modified or deleted, so that we can track the dirty state of the tables.

member.name: M:BlueOcean.Framework.Runtime.Container.Forms.WinScheduleDatabaseSupportBase.System#IDisposable#Dispose
member.summary: Implements the IDisposable interface's Dispose method.

member.name: M:BlueOcean.Framework.Runtime.Container.Forms.WinScheduleDatabaseSupportBase.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by this instance.

member.name: P:BlueOcean.Framework.Runtime.Container.Forms.WinScheduleDatabaseSupportBase.Connection
member.summary: Returns the OleDbConnection with which to connect to the data source. An attempt is made to open the connection the first time the property is accessed.

member.name: P:BlueOcean.Framework.Runtime.Container.Forms.WinScheduleDatabaseSupportBase.ConnectionString
member.summary: Returns the connection string to be assigned to the ConnectionString property of the OleDbConnection referenced by the property. Must be overridden in derived classes to return a valid connection string for the type of database associated with the derived class.

member.name: P:BlueOcean.Framework.Runtime.Container.Forms.WinScheduleDatabaseSupportBase.DataAdapterForOwners
member.summary: Returns the OleDbDataAdapter to be used for Owner data.
member.remarks: The OleDbDataAdapter instance referenced by this property is "lazily" created, i.e., object creation is deferred until the property is requested. When the object is created, the InsertCommand, UpdateCommand and DeleteCommand properties are all set to new instances of OleDbCommand objects, and those instances are configured appropriately.

member.name: P:BlueOcean.Framework.Runtime.Container.Forms.WinScheduleDatabaseSupportBase.DataAdapterForAppointments
member.summary: Returns the OleDbDataAdapter to be used for Owner data.
member.remarks: The OleDbDataAdapter instance referenced by this property is "lazily" created, i.e., object creation is deferred until the property is requested. When the object is created, the InsertCommand, UpdateCommand and DeleteCommand properties are all set to new instances of OleDbCommand objects, and those instances are configured appropriately.

member.name: P:BlueOcean.Framework.Runtime.Container.Forms.WinScheduleDatabaseSupportBase.DataSet
member.summary: Returns the DataSet which holds the Owner and Appointment data.

member.name: P:BlueOcean.Framework.Runtime.Container.Forms.WinScheduleDatabaseSupportBase.Owners
member.summary: Returns the DataTable which contains the Owner data.

member.name: P:BlueOcean.Framework.Runtime.Container.Forms.WinScheduleDatabaseSupportBase.Appointments
member.summary: Returns the DataTable which contains the Appointment data.

member.name: P:BlueOcean.Framework.Runtime.Container.Forms.WinScheduleDatabaseSupportBase.HasOwnerChanges
member.summary: Returns whether the Owners table has changes which have not been committed to the database.

member.name: P:BlueOcean.Framework.Runtime.Container.Forms.WinScheduleDatabaseSupportBase.HasAppointmentChanges
member.summary: Returns whether the Appointments table has changes which have not been committed to the database.
